DOC.brief_title: Thymoglobulin Calcineurin Inhibitor Steroid Minimization Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: All patient receive methyl prednisone intravenously pre-operatively , per institutional practice . Thymoglobulin initiate prior completion anastomosis , possible , within 24 hour transplantation patient total dose 6-7.5mg/kg give 3-5 dos . Steroids initiate post-operatively 1mg/kg/day 2 day , 0.5mg/kg/day 2 day , 0.25mg/kg/day 2 day patient place 5mg daily remainder study . All patient receive Mycophenolic acid dose 2gm/day ( Cellcept ) 1440mg/day ( Myfortic ) post-transplantation dose adjustment need . Cyclosporine micro-emulsion initiate renal function establish later day 10 dose 3mg/kg twice daily adjustment achieve C2 target 600-800 nanograms/ml .
